languages.text: {n}Пауза затягивается. Эвейн пристально смотрит на вас, взвешивая что-то. Наконец он вздыхает.{/n} "Не очень просто довериться человеку, которого видишь в первый раз, но... у меня хорошее предчувствие насчет вас, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус. В конце концов, люди нашего положения могут позволить себе откровенность друг с другом".

{n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."
languages.original_text: {n}Пауза затягивается. Эвейн пристально смотрит на вас, взвешивая что-то. Наконец он вздыхает.{/n} "Не очень просто довериться человеку, которого видишь в первый раз, но... у меня хорошее предчувствие насчет вас, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус. В конце концов, люди нашего положения могут позволить себе откровенность друг с другом".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is a tall order to trust someone you see for the first time, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

{n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

languages.text: {n}Se produce una larga pausa. Evayne te mira fijamente, mientras sopesa algo. Finalmente, suelta un suspiro.{/n} «Confiar en alguien a simple vista es una tarea ardua, pero... tengo un buen presentimiento con usted, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius. A fin de cuentas, las personas que se encuentran en nuestra posición pueden permitirse ser francas entre sí».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce una larga pausa. Evayne te mira fijamente, mientras sopesa algo. Finalmente, suelta un suspiro.{/n} «Confiar en alguien a simple vista es una tarea ardua, pero... tengo un buen presentimiento con usted, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius. A fin de cuentas, las personas que se encuentran en nuestra posición pueden permitirse ser francas entre sí».

languages.text: {n}Es entsteht eine lange Pause. Evayne mustert dich und wägt etwas ab. Schließlich stößt er einen Seufzer aus.{/n} "Es ist eine beschwerliche Aufgabe, jemandem auf den ersten Blick zu vertrauen, doch ... Ich habe ein gutes Gefühl, was Euch angeht, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. Leute von unserem Stand können es sich schließlich leisten, ehrlich zueinander zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es entsteht eine lange Pause. Evayne mustert dich und wägt etwas ab. Schließlich stößt er einen Seufzer aus.{/n} "Es ist eine beschwerliche Aufgabe, jemandem auf den ersten Blick zu vertrauen, doch ... Ich habe ein gutes Gefühl, was Euch angeht, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. Leute von unserem Stand können es sich schließlich leisten, ehrlich zueinander zu sein."

languages.text: {n}Evayne ne vous répond pas tout de suite ; il vous observe d'abord en réfléchissant, puis finit par laisser échapper un soupir.{/n} « C'est assez compliqué de faire confiance à quelqu'un dès les premiers instants, mais... J'ai un bon pressentiment en vous regardant, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. Après tout, les gens comme nous peuvent se permettre de se parler en toute franchise. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne ne vous répond pas tout de suite ; il vous observe d'abord en réfléchissant, puis finit par laisser échapper un soupir.{/n} « C'est assez compliqué de faire confiance à quelqu'un dès les premiers instants, mais... J'ai un bon pressentiment en vous regardant, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. Après tout, les gens comme nous peuvent se permettre de se parler en toute franchise. »

languages.text: {n}艾维尼沉默许久。他看了你一眼，在心中掂量一番，最后叹了口气。{/n}“初次见面就要信任一个人，属实不易。不过……我对您很有好感，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。毕竟，只有我们这种地位的人，才可以彼此坦诚相待。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼沉默许久。他看了你一眼，在心中掂量一番，最后叹了口气。{/n}“初次见面就要信任一个人，属实不易。不过……我对您很有好感，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。毕竟，只有我们这种地位的人，才可以彼此坦诚相待。”

languages.text: {n}長い沈黙が続く。エヴァインはこちらを見つめて、頭の中で何やら思考を巡らせている。やがて、彼はため息をついた。{/n}「初対面で相手を信用するというのは難しいことだが…俺はあなたに対し良い印象を持っている、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。結局のところ、俺たちのような立場の人間は、お互いに率直な意見を述べあう余裕があるからな」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い沈黙が続く。エヴァインはこちらを見つめて、頭の中で何やら思考を巡らせている。やがて、彼はため息をついた。{/n}「一目見て相手を信用するのは大変な話だけど…あなたからは良い印象を受けるんだ、{mf|ロード|レディ} ・フォン・ヴァランシウス。言ってしまえば、俺たち同じ立場の人間ならお互いに遠慮せず話せる」
{n}長い沈黙が続く。エヴァインはこちらを見つめて、頭の中で何やら思考を巡らせている。やがて、彼はため息をついた。{/n}「初対面で相手を信用するというのは難しいことだが…俺はあなたに対し良い印象を持っている、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。結局のところ、俺たちのような立場の人間は、お互いに率直な意見を述べあう余裕があるからな」

languages.text: {n}Uzun bir duraklama oluyor. Evayne sana bakıyor, kafasında bir şeyler tartıyor. Sonunda iç geçiriyor.{/n} "Birine ilk bakışta güvenmek külfetli bir iş ama... Hakkınızda iyi hislerim var {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius. Ne de olsa bizim konumumuzdaki insanlar, birbirlerine karşı açık sözlü olmayı göze alabilirler."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a long pause. Evayne peers at you, weighing something in his mind. Eventually, he lets out a sigh.{/n} "It is an onerous task, trusting someone at first glance, but... I have a good feeling about you, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. After all, people in our position can afford to be candid with one another."

Hakkınızda iyi hislerim var {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius. Ne de olsa bizim konumumuzdaki insanlar, birbirlerine karşı açık sözlü olmayı göze alabilirler."
